mapper.insert: INSERT INTO student(create_at,name, periods, city, course) VALUES(#{createAt}, #{name}, #{periods}, #{city}, #{course})
mapper.select: SELECT id, create_at, name, sno, periods, city, course FROM student WHERE id = #{id}
mapper.update: UPDATE student SET update_at = #{updateAt}, name = #{name}, sno = #{sno}, periods = #{periods}, city = #{city}, course = #{course} WHERE id = #{id}
